title: Tom Brady, Rob Gronkowski, Bill Belichick, Joe Burrow, and Jimmy Garoppolo
itunes:title: Tom Brady, Rob Gronkowski, Bill Belichick, Joe Burrow, and Jimmy Garoppolo
description:
Colin discusses Tom Brady being reunited with Rob Gronkowski, what it says about Bill Belichick, why Joe Burrow will fail with the Bengals, and why the 49ers were considering moving on from Jimmy Garoppolo. Guests include Nick Wright, Joel Klatt, Calais Campbell, and Greg Cosell.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
